title: (x) Het Eiland - Neutraface
content:
In case any of our Flemish or Dutch members were wondering:   
new humor series ["Het Eiland"](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425043104/http:/www.heteiland.be/) uses exclusively [Neutraface](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425043104/http:/houseind.com/house.php?kit=NEUTRAFACE-FO)  
for credits and on-screen captions.   
   
P.S. Don't worry guys I'm not cheating my way back into the   
Type ID Leader Board: this one doesn't count. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425043104im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/bigsmile.gif)
author: Bald Condensed
